sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT T1.MNG_YEAR ,T1.FUEL_CD ,T1.MNG_MT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.USAGE_QY,0),'999,999,990.00')) AS USAGE_QY ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.ENERGY_USAGE_QY,0),'999,999,990.00')) AS ENERGY_USAGE_QY ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.GR_HSE_EMIT_QY,0),'999,999,990.00')) AS GR_HSE_EMIT_QY ,T1.REG_USR ,TO_CHAR(T1.REGIST_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REGIST_DT ,T1.UPD_USR ,TO_CHAR(T1.UPDT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPDT_DT ,SUBSTRB(T1.MNG_MT,1,4) AS MNG_MT_YEAR ,SUBSTRB(T1.MNG_MT,5,2) AS MNG_MT_MON ,SUBSTRB(T1.MNG_MT,1,4) || '-' || SUBSTRB(T1.MNG_MT,5,2) AS MNG_YR_MT ,T2.FUEL_NM ,T2.ENERGY_UNIT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.ENERGY_TOTAL_CAL_VAL,0),'999,999,990.0')) AS ENERGY_TOTAL_CAL_VAL ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.ENERGY_NET_CAL_VAL,0),'999,999,990.0')) AS ENERGY_NET_CAL_VAL ,T2.GR_HSE_UNIT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.GR_HSE_COEF,0),'0.9999')) AS GR_HSE_COEF FROM GR_HSE_EMIT_STTUS_F T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ENERGY_USAGEQY_COEF_F T2 ON (T1.MNG_YEAR=T2.MNG_YEAR AND T1.FUEL_CD=T2.FUEL_CD) WHERE 1=1
AND T1.MNG_MT = #sMngYear# || #sMngMt#
AND T1.FUEL_CD LIKE '%' || #sFuelCd# || '%'
ORDER BY T1.FUEL_CD ) S ) A
WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM GR_HSE_EMIT_STTUS_F WHERE 1=1
AND MNG_MT = #sMngYear# || #sMngMt#
AND FUEL_CD LIKE '%' || #sFuelCd# || '%'

SELECT T1.MNG_YEAR ,T1.FUEL_CD ,T1.MNG_MT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.USAGE_QY,0),'999,999,990.00')) AS USAGE_QY ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.ENERGY_USAGE_QY,0),'999,999,990.00')) AS ENERGY_USAGE_QY ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.GR_HSE_EMIT_QY,0),'999,999,990.00')) AS GR_HSE_EMIT_QY ,T1.REG_USR ,TO_CHAR(T1.REGIST_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REGIST_DT ,T1.UPD_USR ,TO_CHAR(T1.UPDT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPDT_DT ,SUBSTRB(T1.MNG_MT,1,4) AS MNG_MT_YEAR ,SUBSTRB(T1.MNG_MT,5,2) AS MNG_MT_MON ,SUBSTRB(T1.MNG_MT,1,4) || '-' || SUBSTRB(T1.MNG_MT,5,2) AS MNG_YR_MT ,T2.FUEL_NM ,T2.ENERGY_UNIT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.ENERGY_TOTAL_CAL_VAL,0),'999,999,990.0')) AS ENERGY_TOTAL_CAL_VAL ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.ENERGY_NET_CAL_VAL,0),'999,999,990.0')) AS ENERGY_NET_CAL_VAL ,T2.GR_HSE_UNIT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.GR_HSE_COEF,0),'0.9999')) AS GR_HSE_COEF FROM GR_HSE_EMIT_STTUS_F T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ENERGY_USAGEQY_COEF_F T2 ON (T1.MNG_YEAR=T2.MNG_YEAR AND T1.FUEL_CD=T2.FUEL_CD) WHERE T1.FUEL_CD = #fuelCd# AND T1.MNG_YEAR = #mngYear# AND T1.MNG_MT = #mngMtYear# || #mngMtMon#

SELECT T1.MT ,NVL(SUM(T2.GR_HSE_EMIT_QY),0) AS GR_HSE_EMIT_QY FROM ( SELECT #fuelCd# AS FUEL_CD ,#mngMtYear#|| LTRIM(TO_CHAR(LEVEL,'00')) AS MNG_MT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(LEVEL,'00')) AS MT FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 12 ) T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN GR_HSE_EMIT_STTUS_F T2 ON (T1.FUEL_CD=T2.FUEL_CD AND T1.MNG_MT=T2.MNG_MT) GROUP BY T1.MT ORDER BY T1.MT
SELECT COUNT(*) AS MT_CNT ,TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#sMngYear# || #sMngMt#,'YYYYMM'),-1),'YYYYMM') AS PREV_MT FROM GR_HSE_EMIT_STTUS_F WHERE MNG_MT = #sMngYear# || #sMngMt#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE GR_HSE_EMIT_STTUS_F SET USAGE_QY = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#usageQy#,',','')),0) ,ENERGY_USAGE_QY = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#energyUsageQy#,',','')),0) ,GR_HSE_EMIT_QY = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#grHseEmitQy#,',','')),0) ,UPD_USR = #updUsr# ,UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE FUEL_CD = #fuelCd# AND MNG_YEAR = #mngYear# AND MNG_MT = #mngMtYear# || #mngMtMon#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE GR_HSE_EMIT_STTUS_F WHERE FUEL_CD = #fuelCd# AND MNG_YEAR = #mngYear# AND MNG_MT = #mngMtYear# || #mngMtMon#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO GR_HSE_EMIT_STTUS_F ( FUEL_CD ,MNG_YEAR ,MNG_MT ,USAGE_QY ,ENERGY_USAGE_QY ,GR_HSE_EMIT_QY ,REG_USR ,REGIST_DT ) SELECT FUEL_CD ,#sMngYear# ,#sMngYear# || #sMngMt# ,USAGE_QY ,ENERGY_USAGE_QY ,GR_HSE_EMIT_QY ,#regUsr# ,SYSDATE FROM GR_HSE_EMIT_STTUS_F WHERE MNG_MT = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#sMngYear# || #sMngMt#,'YYYYMM'),-1),'YYYYMM')
